alert.note: Alert for Campbell; Claiborne; Scott (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 2:15PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Claiborne, Campbell and east central Scott Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 315 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Jacksboro, or 9 miles west of La Follette, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... La Follette, Jacksboro, Jellico, Caryville, Elk Valley, Indian Mountain State Park, Clairfield, Fincastle, Royal Blue and White Oak. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for east Tennessee.
